entry.title: Man Dies in Camas Valley House Fire
entry.summary: A house fire on Holmes Creek Road Wednesday night claimed the life of 76-year-old Richard Wayne Bemiller, who was unable to escape. Despite rescue attempts, firefighters found him deceased. The Oregon State Fire Marshal’s Office is investigating the cause.

entry.title: LENTEN MEDITATIONS IN MUSIC BEGINS FRIDAY
